name: Favorite Miner
description: Favorite Miner is another 2D platformer with elements of survival in which you have to pass a variety of levels playing for a digger.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 500MB DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 170 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: Intel Core i9 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1GB DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 300 MB available space
